- Got the Full Stack Web3 Dev Internship @zerufinance 
- Ambassador @arbitrumcore 
- Speaker for @Girlscript1 
- Attended the @arweaveindia Hacker House
- Won at @ETHIndiaco 1st IRL Hackathon
- Made a lot of frens

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
If you're looking for a reason to register for the Abstraction Hack, here's the best one: it's a fantastic opportunity to learn and land a job
https://www.abstracting.org/

altan tutar | albluedragon.near (⋈, 🤖, 🐉): We are hiring a technical content writer to work with us at the @NEARFoundation starting at a contract basis!
This person will work with myself and @chronear to put content like those that we have been putting lately on sharding, DA, and anything NEAR related.
Ideally, they… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1740403356181447144
